channel.title: First ever skin, please rate and give opinions
channel.description:
Hey, Im quite new to web design and graphics, and I wanted to try myself with photoshop and web design so I made this skin. This website design is simple yet fulfils my needs and it is made to be light weight so it can load fast on slow internet connections. I would really appreciate it if you guys would take some time and review it and rate it and tell me how I can better it.
http://howlinghawk.com
Thank you

item.description:
@howlinghawk wrote:

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, Email Sending, No Ads | AwardSpace.com

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, Email Sending, No Ads | AwardSpace.com

AwardSpace is a free web hosting provider with NO ADS, paid web hosting, VPS hosting, reseller hosting, domain name registration and SSL certificates


Great host, but the problem is that it only gives one sql database
